idCitation.resTitle: Send Email With Zip File Attachment (Server)

idAbs.para: Emails a file to an email address using an SMTP email server.

This tool is primarily intended for use as a part of a Clip and Email/Data Extraction geoprocessing service. To this end, this script tool is contained in the Extract Data and Email Task model tool and is primarily intended for use by that model.

tool.name: SendEmailWithZipFileAttachment
tool.displayname: Send Email With Zip File Attachment (Server)

summary.para: Emails a file to an email address using an SMTP email server.

This tool is primarily intended for use as a part of a Clip and Email/Data Extraction geoprocessing service. To this end, this script tool is contained in the Extract Data and Email Task model tool and is primarily intended for use by that model.

pythonReference.para: The email address of the recipient.

dialogReference.para: The email address of the recipient.

pythonReference.para: The email address of the sender.

dialogReference.para: The email address of the sender.

pythonReference.para: The text in the subject line of the email.

dialogReference.para: The text in the subject line of the email.

pythonReference.para: The body text of the email.

dialogReference.para: The body text of the email.

pythonReference.para: The file to be attached to the email.

dialogReference.para: The file to be attached to the email.

pythonReference.para: The maximum allowable size of an attachment.
If you don't know what to use for Max File Size, check the attachment size limit of your SMTP mail server and the recipient email provider.

dialogReference.para: The maximum allowable size of an attachment.
If you don't know what to use for Max File Size, check the attachment size limit of your SMTP mail server and the recipient email provider.

pythonReference.para: The SMTP email server that will deliver the email.

dialogReference.para: The SMTP email server that will deliver the email.

pythonReference.para: The user which will log in to the SMTP email server.

dialogReference.para: The user which will log in to the SMTP email server.

pythonReference.para: The user password used to connect to the SMTP email server (if necessary).

dialogReference.para: The user password used to connect to the SMTP email server (if necessary).

bullet_item.para: Ask your system administrator for details about an SMTP email server that you can use.
